<script>
    function foo(s) {
        if (s === 'will this run') {
            return `def ran():
    some_list = ['Yes', ', ', 'this ', 'ran ', 'Python']
    print("".join(some_list))
ran()`
        } else {
            return 'print("No, it didn\'t")';
        }
    }
</script>
<pre data-ace-interactive-code data-code-mapper="foo">will this run</pre>
